level.heading: CONTINUING ELIGIBILITY AND REPORTING REQUIREMENTS (ยง 27-814)

level.text: 814.1 During the term of a certificate, a CBE shall report to the Departmentny change of address, change of ownership, or other change that may affect theontinued eligibility of the CBE within thirty (30) days of the date of thehange.
814.2 Upon learning of any changes, the Department may request documentationegarding compliance with the Act and these regulations and conduct onsitenspections.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 39 DCR 9052 (December 4, 1992); asmended by Final Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 8439 (October 23, 2009),ncorporating by reference text of Proposed Rulemaking published at 56 DCR 5622,634 (July 10, 2009).
